law.history: Repealed 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 113, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 114, sec. 12. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 58, sec. 19, effective March 5, 1952.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Reimbursement for loss, damage or expense -- Notice of claim -- Reimbursement where aid rendered outside state.
